story:
Where Did This All Start?

To answer that, I need to tell you what happened driving around Nashville, TN nearly 10 years ago. You know when you just know that your time is up somewhere? I hadn't been praying, fasting, or the doing the super spiritual things one should do at a season change, but my apartment lease was up. I remember saying out loud, "God, what do you want me to do?" and as if He was sitting in that car, I heard Him say, "What do YOU want to do?" I was like...Is that a legal question??? Hahahaha! Out of my mouth came, "I want to go to New York to finish my vocal training!" and He said GO!!!! I had no earthly idea that NYC would immediately capture my heart and become the soil of my destiny.

Something happened to me walking the streets of NYC with absolutely no plan B. God was always talking, and I learned to listen with intentionality at the most inconvenient times and places.  A friend and I began having nights of worship, random people began to come, and I fell in love with my living room. I found myself surrounded by amazing New Yorkers from different churches and backgrounds, and God exploded His love on all us. For years, all He would let us do is learn how to receive His love, and that became my forever core message and agenda.

Can you believe thousands of people have come through that tiny apartment to worship and love each other well? From there my heart began to expand with a deep desire for people all over the world to see their identity wrapped up in His. Seek Church was birthed in that room and many of these songs came out of spontaneous times of worship and ministry with my heroes.

What is it about these songs????

Everything changes for a writer, performer, minister, and even a friend, when you fall in love with the one right in front of you. When my number one goal in life became to be the best receiver of God's love that I had ever met, I learned how to love. Compassion took over and became the love motivation for the ear at the other end of my voice.

Create With Me

After years of crafting songs as a published songwriter, I found myself sitting at the piano and singing new songs as if I had known it forever. One of my favorite moments was hearing the invitation to “create with Him” and knowing it was a game changer.

Create with me all you sons and you daughters. 

Embrace a life of new songs and new colors.

I got completely freaked out as I sang these words and felt His Presence all over me. Then in the midst of the excitement of creativity, He wrecked me as I so clearly heard the next words…

You're not orphans anymore

You're not beggars you never were

I have always seen you free

So common create with me

I lost it at that point as His reality absorbed into my own. A few days later, while in a NYC cab holding on for dear life, I heard God ask, "What is your response?" I knew He was talking about this song!!! Immediately I said "Thank you, for seeing me like You do...” and the rest of the song came.

Every Song Is An Experience

Every song on this album is about our identity in Him. He doesn't beat around the bush in His extravagant love for us, and His obvious desire is that we live here on earth like the sons and daughters of the Creator we are. I believe that every song will result in an experience that changes everything for the listener.

What do I need from you????

I need your help to fund this album. This is an enormous undertaking, and requires more than just me. The producers, musicians, and singers that are part of this project are the best of the best and bring their own unique color and texture to the sound. Beyond the fact that it will cost around $30,000 to complete, it is so important to me that you are also a part of this is a team effort.

What I Need Funding For

  • Studio fees
  • Contracting Musicians
  • Hiring Producers 
  • Rehearsal space
  • Publishing
  • Engineers
  • Marketing and PR
  • Art work and album design
  • CD Manufacturing & Duplication
  • Administrative work

If I don't raise enough

We will use whatever funds we receive to begin recording the album and search for other ways to complete the funding and finish the project. 

If I raise more than I need

Any and all additional funds raised will be used for future projects that are already in the works.

Other ways you can help

I understand not everyone is able to contribute financially, so here's how you can still help:

  • Please help me promote this campaign on your Facebook and other social media pages.
  • Spread the word about the album when it is released.
  • Pray for us as we record. We are going after a new sound that translates His heart through music and sound to the studio, and right into the atmosphere of the listener.

Thank You!

It is such a huge deal that you would sow into this project in such a powerful way. I am truly honored that you would join me on this exciting journey!

story:
Through this campaign, I would like to continue the legacy of being acknowledged as Riannti through my previous successful crowdfunding projects. I would also like to show my gratitude to my fans by continuing to create more music for you to enjoy. This song, "Free", showcases many musical elements I have always wanted to improve and thanks to Alan Roy Scott, a legendary songwriter who guided me to break out of my songwriting barrier, I have achieved what I envisioned. I can only hope this song will make you all proud. xo

 

Riannti & The Campaign
My name is Riannti and I am an independent singer and songwriter from Indonesia. One of my biggest supporters from the United States describes my music as, "a mix of pop, R&B with dance and rock elements infused to create melodies that leave the listener feeling good all day and all night."  You can hear snippets of all my music at http://wolfpackmusic.com/riannti-jakarta-indone... hopefully, it will inspire you to become a part of my musical journey.

This will be my third crowdfunding campaign and previously, with the help of 100 supporters, I raised almost $10,000 USD through two crowdfunding platforms, Sellaband and Indiegogo.  The funds I raised were used to record and launch my first solo album, "All Night" and a music video for the title track of the album. Here is the video:

 

Because of my previous crowdfunding projects, not only was I able to produce an album I am proud of and one that the investors loved...the opportunities that followed have opened many doors for my singing career. Many people from countries around the world made this possible and I am deeply touched and thankful they believed in me and shared in my success. For musicians in today's interconnected world, there are many ways to get their music heard and crowdfunding is one of the ways that makes this all possible. My friends, family, and investors inspire me to keep going and never give up and for that, I am thankful to have their support.

 

My Thoughts and Your Support
With this project, my goal is to raise $4,500 USD to make a professional video for one of my songs that truly represents and conveys the meaning behind the song as I intended.


Your Contributions and How to Support
You have helped me live my dream. You have also shown me that we can earn our own opportunities in whatever we do. Regardless how big or small, the attitude has taught me a lot!

I would like to thank everyone in advance who chose to help me by funding this project. For those who are not able to do so, please know that I appreciate any kind of support and if you would share this project with your friends and aquaintances or make a buzz, I believe your kindness will make a big difference!!

Oh, this is my latest video I want to share:

 

Thank you!!!

Ri xoxo

story:
Summary

My name is Samuel Foucher, I am a 19-year old student, musician, technologist, martial artist, and soon-to-be wilderness adventurer. Music has been an important part of my life since I started playing accordion when I was 12. By releasing this CD, I am raising funds for a transformative journey with Kroka Expeditions. The expedition is a 5-month trek through Vermont and Canada, travelling by ski in the winter, and canoe, rowboat, and bicycle after the snow melts. Along the way I will be studying academics with the small group of students, and there will be many opportunities for growing and expanding myself. Although I will be leaving my accordion behind (It’s too heavy for backpacking on skis!), I am incorporating my love of music into this trip by creating a CD. I have recorded 6 tracks of my solo accordion playing, and several live tracks featuring some of my talented friends. The music I play comes from the celtic tradition of Ireland, and its descendants in New England and Canada. The CD will be available shortly after I return in mid-June.

In the past few months I have been getting the gear I need, dehydrating food for the trail, and working on my physical fitness. A remaining challenge is the cost of the program, in tuition and equipment. So far, I have raised more than two-thirds through a variety of ways: Working from the spring through December, contributions from my parents and other family members, scholarships, and a concert I put on with sibling duo Liz and Dan Faiella. I need to raise another $3,000 to complete the cost of the program by the time I return. I am offering these items as thank-you gifts:

$20, I will ship you one of my CDs.

$50, I will send you 3 CDs, and a note of reflection with a few stories from my expedition.

$150, I will send you 5 CDs, a note of reflection, and a wooden spoon I will make by hand. I will be learning to make these out of found pieces of wood along the trail during the expedition!


Even if I do not reach my goal of $3,000, contributions will go towards my trip, and I will be sending the CDs and other items to anyone who orders them.

 

The Impact

In going on this expedition, I am excited to see more of the world and the wilderness. I can’t wait to experience the bracing cold, deep snow, forest, mountains, rivers, and lakes! I hope to come home a better person in so many ways, with skills and motivation to live my mission in the world. I want to live in a world where people live in strong communities, and humans are stewards of the earth. I want to be this change that I would like to see. At this time in my life, I am focused on learning and overcoming my own obstacles so that I am more capable of living this mission. Physical stamina, social skills, connection to nature, and courage are important to me. I seek to develop these by going on this semester. It will push my body and increase my strength, give me a chance to live in a tightly knit community, allow me to experience nature intensely, and help me face fear. It will teach me how to live lightly on the earth. I believe I will come home from this adventure an empowered and stronger person.

I am also excited to begin sharing my music with the world! I grew up and live in Harrisville, NH, where I was homeschooled for my entire childhood through high school. This educational experience, the area I lived in, and the local community inspired in me a deep seated interest in learning and nature. I enjoyed the flexibility of homeschooling and it allowed me to explore many things in the community I grew up in. I became involved in music, martial arts, technology, and many other activities with local people. One of the highlights was attending contra dances almost every week. I gradually got involved with the community and the musicians who created a wonderful open band for the Nelson, NH dance. I started spending more time on stage playing for the dance, attending music camps, and studying with local masters such as the late celebrated contra dance pianist Bob McQuillen. I played my first full-length gig with a band of friends a little more than a year ago. Most recently, I played with Liz and Dan Faiella for my fundraising concert on January 8th which brought together over 70 people from the local community! The CD will include a few live tracks recorded at this concert. It is my first recording, and I am excited for you to hear it!

Risks & Challenges

I am producing this CD myself, and the raw recordings are done. All that remains is for me to do the mastering and order the copies. Ordering the CDs after this fundraiser will allow me to know exactly how many I need. I have identified the source for the copies, and I am aware of all associated costs.

I anticipate little challenge since a large part of the process is complete, other than the exciting risks and challenges of my adventure at Kroka! I return from my trip in mid-June, and I plan on shipping the CDs by mid-July. This leaves some buffer time in case I discover an issue. If all goes well, I will ship them sooner.

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate any contributions you are able to give, and your interest in my project and expedition! Here are some ways you can help other than contributing financially:

 

Share with your friends, family, and any music lovers you know!

Click to learn more about

Kroka Expeditions  http://www.kroka.org/page/index.shtml

Arctic Dream Semester http://www.kroka.org/semester/semester_ad_descr...

the Monadnock Folklore Society  http://www.monadnockfolk.org/?p=7229

 

Thanks to:

 

Peter Martel: recording advice and equipment

Liz and Dan Faiella  https://lizanddanmusic.com/

Monadnock Folklore Society

Many other family members and friends
story_txt:
Summary
My name is Samuel Foucher, I am a 19-year old student, musician, technologist, martial artist, and soon-to-be wilderness adventurer. Music has been an important part of my life since I started playing accordion when I was 12. By releasing this CD, I am raising funds for a transformative journey with Kroka Expeditions. The expedition is a 5-month trek through Vermont and Canada, travelling by ski in the winter, and canoe, rowboat, and bicycle after the snow melts. Along the way I will be studying academics with the small group of students, and there will be many opportunities for growing and expanding myself. Although I will be leaving my accordion behind (It’s too heavy for backpacking on skis!), I am incorporating my love of music into this trip by creating a CD. I have recorded 6 tracks of my solo accordion playing, and several live tracks featuring some of my talented friends. The music I play comes from the celtic tradition of Ireland, and its descendants in New England and Canada. The CD will be available shortly after I return in mid-June.
In the past few months I have been getting the gear I need, dehydrating food for the trail, and working on my physical fitness. A remaining challenge is the cost of the program, in tuition and equipment. So far, I have raised more than two-thirds through a variety of ways: Working from the spring through December, contributions from my parents and other family members, scholarships, and a concert I put on with sibling duo Liz and Dan Faiella. I need to raise another $3,000 to complete the cost of the program by the time I return. I am offering these items as thank-you gifts:

I appreciate any contributions you are able to give, and your interest in my project and expedition! Here are some ways you can help other than contributing financially: Share with your friends, family, and any music lovers you know!
Click to learn more about
Kroka Expeditions  http://www.kroka.org/page/index.shtml
Arctic Dream Semester http://www.kroka.org/semester/semester_ad_descr...
the Monadnock Folklore Society  http://www.monadnockfolk.org/?p=7229 Thanks to: Peter Martel: recording advice and equipment

story: Heartracer began in Chris Cosby's home studio when his brother Chip moved back to their hometown of Richmond, Virginia. The brothers grew up playing separately in different acts but were finally at a time in their lives where they could blend their talents together. Since their debut full length In Flight, Heartracer has released 2 EP's 'Summer Gold' and 'Eat Your Heart Out' each of which has received critical acclaim from the indie world, hailing the brothers along with their drummer Bryan Reyes as the next great synth-indie pop act in the vein of M83, St. Lucia, The 1975. Now with the "Together, Let's Play" campaign you have the chance to shape the world of indie music by putting a DIY band in the prestigious LA studio Sunset Sound with the producer of St. Lucia and Passion Pit Andrew Lappin. By doing so you will receive exclusive rewards such as VIP access, signed merchandise, and a behind the scenes look at the production of Heartracer's next album.

story:
My Big Break

 

Music is my life. Besides my love for God and my amazing family, It's really all I think about and everything I care about. 

"With A Devil" is a song that is deeply personal and holds a lot of meaning for me. It was written about one of the darkest times in my life. But its bigger then that. I feel that the message of the song is universal and one that everyone can relate to. Most people have experienced betrayal and heartbreak and I feel that, with the help of you all and Threshold Films, I can bring a unique perception and understanding to this very common human experience.

The reason I'm choosing to produce this music video in Virtual Reality is because, I feel that it adds something tangible to the viewing experience. The audience can be right there with me and can share and experience all the things that I experience through the song. To me that's beautiful.

That's why I need YOUR help to bring this into the world and not just help me tell my story, but EVERYONE'S story.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds go directly to hiring crew, actors, and post production! We need permits and locations and that stuff doesn't come cheap, especially in NYC!

Plus, check out the amazing perks!

The Impact

Aside from the obvious...helping to bring my music to life. You will get to be on the ground floor of the pioneering and world changing technology that is Virtual Reality! No one has done this yet. We can be trend setters TOGETHER! 

WE CAN LITERALLY SHAPE THE FUTURE OF MUSIC VIDEOS as we work together as a team on this!

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember guys A dollar goes a long way. YES, just a dollar. But, that's not all the ways you can help. Social media goes a long long way too! So the more you share the better this will be and the more we ALL get out of it!

story:
Short Summary

We are four Beatle-lovin' lads on Oahu, Hawaii who have re-created the idea of a Beatles tribute band. Such bands all look the same (for obvious reasons!), sound the same and certainly do their part in spreading Beatle love. Nothing wrong with that.

However, Beatle-Lele Mania! has taken the music of greatest band ever and transposed those songs through Hawaii's favorite instrument, the ukulele, an instrument with continuing global popularity and still featuring each band member performing and singing their respective "Beatle parts". With a cajon for added percussion, hearing these songs in this way is a truly unique, island-style experience.

We want to share this one-of-a-kind experience with you- and the world, and are preparing to record our debut album later this spring. We humbly ask for your help to have us reach our goal to bring this project to reality. In doing so, we'll provide you with fantastic incentives and perks listed on the right side of this page. With this collaboration, we will be able to provide this Hawaiian-style version of the Beatles music to the rest of the world.

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to reach or exceed a stated goal of $12,000. As outlined in our intro video above, reaching this goal will help to offset our costs which include recording/mixing/mastering our debut album, album press design and artwork, video production/editing, marketing/advertising, costs of incentives being offered and the fee's associated with this campaign. We've also had a little help from our friends and they get a little tired of working for free after awhile.

Paul McCartney said, "...and in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make". In return for your "Beatle love", we will provide you with digital downloads and autographed copies of our debut "Beatle-Lele Mania!" album before anyone else this summer. You can also receive limited edition "Beatle-Lele Mania!" T-shirts, band photo, special recognition on our "Mahalo" page of our website, opportunities to play at your private party/event and even solid koa ukulele's and VIP access to our CD Release Party later this summer in Honolulu. Heck, we'll even let you co-star in one of our upcoming video's! We appreciate your faith and love in our project and even if we don't hit our goal of $12,000, we intend to make good on all the incentives for those that make a contribution. 

The Impact

To insure we put out the best album possible, we have enlisted the "A-list" of "A-list" producers in Hawaii; none other than Dave Tucciarone, himself. For the past couple decades, Dave has produced/engineered a who's who of Hawaiian music and has his name attributed to 300 albums, 13 Na Hoku Hano Hano Awards, including recent Grammy Award Hawaiian artist, Kalani Pe'a.

Like the members of Beatle-Lele Mania!, Dave is an avid fan of The Beatles and knows how important the accuracy of "getting it right" is to our group. You can be assured, he is the right man for the job!

To our knowledge, there is no other Beatles tribute group in the world performing the music of The Beatles as we are on ukulele's with cajon. With the world's love of Hawaii, the ukulele and the music of The Beatles, we believe this beautiful combination will be a positive impact upon those who hear it. In the end, we hope to foster and be ambassador's of peace and aloha to the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

We respect if you are not in a position to help fund this Indiegogo campaign. That is totally ok! What you can do...

1. Sharing is Caring! What we ask that you do is use the Indiegogo SHARE TOOL and spread this campaign of love with others. Start with those executives you know who work at Google or Microsoft, or any recipient of funds for Honolulu's Rail project or your boss, your employer, your rich auntie...you get the idea!

2. And very importantly, please keep us and this project in your prayers. We are giving it our all and have no idea where this will go. But at least we'll be able to look back on this bucket list item and say, "we gave it our all, boys!" With your help, and the good Lord above, we are confident our music will come to fruition.

Wherever this magical mystery tour takes us on this long and winding road, we will submit to. We are grateful to you for taking the time to consider funding this recording endeavor and pray for you in return that you receive an abundance of Beatle blessings!

story:
My Story

My name is (Matt)hew Almodiel and I'm a singer/songwriter based in Los Angeles. Originally from the Washington, D.C area, I moved to LA for that one dream - music. But for me, my dream isn't just a dream, it's a lifestyle, a movement, a gathering, a language, something that defines me, my whole character. Growing up, music played a huge factor in my childhood. I was always told that singing was frowned upon, in which if a man were to sing, they’d be considered “gay”. Bullied in middle and high school for the simple fact of being a singer, I must admit that I did turn away from it all. But I always found myself singing in church, or used some kind of outlet music related. I got accustomed to my own well being knowing that it’s a “part of me”. And I couldn’t change that. To this day, that’s something that I can proudly say that I’m glad I didn’t.

Here I am as a 23-year-old singer/songwriter, a victim of bullying, of being ridiculed for being openly gay, of racism, and of body shaming in the (music) industry. I stand proudly to say that I’m a confident survivor. And will constantly yearn to be the voice of those who feel as if they’ve gone through, or currently going through any hardships in their life. I’m a regular person, with a huge voice, and a dream to follow. That dream isn’t just the music; it’s for everyone to have self-confidence and acceptance within themselves. This EP is not just for me, it’s for all of those who feel they can’t speak for themselves. I’m a geek. I’m a nerd. We’re in this together.

What is "We're All Awkward"?

“We’re All Awkward” will be my comeback EP after four years but more or less, my debut EP. I’m putting so much heart and soul into this project. It’ll be a five song “pop and funk inspired” EP with influences from Shawn Mendes to Sam Smith. Each song was handwritten from personal experiences in my life and it’s about time to bring them to life.

The title is inspired by my lifestyle. I’m a regular human being with awkward tendencies, and proud of that. I’m not the only one either. The term “awkward” symbolizes our differences. And deeply, it’s something we all have in common, just like being awkward. “We’re all awkward”.

I’m using this project to showcase the improvement in my artistry. I haven’t released anything professionally in about over four years and I have a lot to show, a lot to prove, and a hell of a lot to say. But I cannot do this alone. My one wish is for you to seek hope and believe in the work that I do and the reasons behind it. One of my goals is to be an acknowledged openly Gay Asian American Man (with an image Hollywood doesn’t approve of normally) to win a Grammy, to prove that if someone with so many differences as myself can do it, others can do it too.

What We Need & Where Is It Going?

I'm crowdfunding an approximate 7,000 dollars to finally get this product tangible. This is what we need to get this voice out and how it will be broken down.

  • Production and recording - $4,500
  • Mixing and Mastering - $500
  • Physical Copies - $800
  • Copyrights/Distribution/Publishing - $500
  • Merchandise - $350
  • Indiegogo 5% Fee - $350

Total - $7,000. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word! Share my posts and help with the movement! 
  • Download my music. 
  • Express your love in hashtags and utilize your social media. 
  • Take a selfie with yourself and make the best, hilarious, funniest faces ever, post it up online and hashtag #wereallawkwardtogether with tagging my name @mattalmodiel. I'll repost it, give you a shout out and reciprocate the love back to ya!

Look to the side where the perks are at. I promise you, it'll be something worth going over. 

 

Thank you so much for taking your time into reading over how immensely awkward I am. I cannot express enough how close I am to putting our dreams into a tangible project. Cannot wait to express our voices together. This isn't my project, it's ours. And I can't wait to share our voices!

 

-Matt Almodiel "We're All Awkward" Together

story:
The Fire Escape Sessions

Harnessing today's technology of social media to create a groundbreaking musical event that brings the exclusivity of a private show into the reach of a captive audience:

  • I am a combat veteran transitioning home to enter law school.
  • My love for the music industry inspired me to team up with Chad Graham.
  • We have created a show that brings entertainment back to musical performances, that will be available to view on social media platforms .

By keeping events at small venues, the scarcity of availability increases.  All shows will be recorded to video and for podcast for later release to the public.

We need your support

Your contributions will aid us in covering our production costs:

  • Our total expenses for talent, video, recording, and sound engineers is $2,000.
  • By contributing, you will become a sponsor and part producer of our show!
  • Your donation will allow us to get the start up that we need to launch our event.
story_txt:
The Fire Escape Sessions
Harnessing today's technology of social media to create a groundbreaking musical event that brings the exclusivity of a private show into the reach of a captive audience:

I am a combat veteran transitioning home to enter law school.
My love for the music industry inspired me to team up with Chad Graham.
We have created a show that brings entertainment back to musical performances, that will be available to view on social media platforms .

By keeping events at small venues, the scarcity of availability increases.  All shows will be recorded to video and for podcast for later release to the public.

We need your support
Your contributions will aid us in covering our production costs:

Our total expenses for talent, video, recording, and sound engineers is $2,000.
By contributing, you will become a sponsor and part producer of our show!
Your donation will allow us to get the start up that we need to launch our event.

story:
Short Summary

I'm Teraj and I'm an R&B/Pop singer and performer with stories and a voice that I'd love to share with the world. My debut album will be an amazing body of work that chronicles a few chapters in my life: love, loss, struggle, and triumph. It'll be a celebration of humanity in all its splendor and hardship, and will have a range moments that provoke thought, leaving listeners inspired and uplifted.

None of this will be possible without the support of those who believe in my project, and the successful funding of this campaign, and that's where I need your help. The proceeds of this campaign will go toward the creation of a polished, top-notch, and an immaculately conceived debut EP comprised of 6-8 songs, and I promise to deliver incredible music and vocals.

Reaching the goal of this campaign will allow me to collaborate with music producers and other talented songwriters to bring an extraordinary album to life. Music and performing are my ultimate passions, and have been a dream of mine since a child. I've been performing on stage since high school, was a part of an awesome a cappella group, The Class Notes, at Cornell University and released promotional singles a few years back and put on shows in New York City. Fast forward to today, as a model and real estate agent, I long for the opportunity to sing and make music again. Everyday, I wake up with melodies, lyrics, and sometimes complete songs from my dreams. The majority of one of my previous songs Fallin' for You came about this way. The lyrics, the melody, all the way to the background harmonies, all came to me in a dream and there are so many other songs that came from the same process. I'm certain that it is the universe telling me, daily, that I was born to make music and perform.

What I've learned over the last few years is that launching a successful music career is one venture I cannot do on my own. I welcome all of the support that I can receive to launch my debut album and ultimately begin the journey of fulfilling my dream as a singer, songwriter and performer.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I've seen artists successfully use this platform to release albums, music videos, and ultimately launch careers worth having. I'd also like to show where every penny is going that is raised from this campaign, showing a high-quality record comes at a price. If the goal is exceeded, I may be able to do things I have only dreamt about. Regardless of the closing total, I will work hard to deliver an amazing album accompanied by stunning visuals.

 

The Impact

By joining me on this journey, you yourself are taking charge and helping to change how music is made. Your contributions, support and faith in this project will imbue even more passion in the writing process, recording sessions, delivery of the final product, and stage performances. 

I give you my word that I will not settle for "good enough" and above all, the money raised will be reflected in the quality of the album.

Here's to making a collection of my best songs yet, I will not let you down.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't know what to think about this project and aren't sure if you can commit, there are other ways you can help out. Spread the word! Tell your family and friends and let them know what's going on, it would help immensely. With social media and all of the many ways we now connect with one another, by posting links to this page you are reaching audiences and places I would never be able to reach.

 

Budget

Here's a projected budget we've prepared to give you an idea as to how we've planned to allocate the funds. (Budget is based on reaching our goal).

Recording Budget 

  Expenses 

Pre-Production ($200 a song)                                     $1,600.00

Launch Video                                                                      $1,500.00

Studio Fees 

Studio Time                                                                       $8,000.00

Producer Fees                                                                 $12,500.00

Other Workers (engineer, assistants)                      $3,000.00

Per Diems ($25)                                                               $2,250.00

Session Fees                                                                                  TBD

Post-Recording 

Mixing Fees                                                                       $5,000.00

Mastering                                                                           $1,800.00

Artwork                                                                               $1,500.00

Other Expenses 

Management Commission                                                      TBD

Travel                                                                                  $1,500.00

Accommodations                                                           $1,500.00

 

  Grand Total                                                                           $40,150.00

 

Fundraising Total                                                        $50,000.00

Indie GoGo Fees (4%)                                                -$2,000.00

Credit Card fees (3%)                                                 -$1,500.00

Adjusted Gross                                                            $46,500.00

Cost of Goods for Perks (12.5%)*                          -$6,250.00

*Excludes travel and accommodation costs in Travel Tier Packages.

 

Studio Money                                                               $40,250.00

story:
The Burning Glass

Edwin and Kizzy made the album 'Things that Happened and Other Stories back in 2014, Since then we've been joined by the mountainous talents of Nina Harries on bass and vocals and Joseph Trudgeon on electric guitar.

What we need

We need £5000 to make this happen. This breaks down as £3000 for the recording, mixing and mastering. £1500 for the sleeve design, artwork and pressing of the CD's and £500 to get the t-shirts and other amazing merchandise we need which we will be giving away as perks as well as selling at gigs with the ultimate aim of  getting the music out to as many people as we can and thus raising the overall levels of happiness in the world a tiny bit at a time!

story:
Our band has been writing songs and playing shows up and down the west coast for over three years. During this time we've accumulated over 40+ fully recorded demos, released an EP and will be featured as one of the top prospects in the 2016 years end issue of Music Connection magazine. With the money we've saved and a little help from our friends at The Greenlit Collective, we entered The Panda Studios with Producer Sam Pura (The Story So Far, State Champs, Basement) to record our debut album. On November 1st, we started the 35 day process to narrow down and shape years of material into the 10 best songs that will make our record. It has been an exciting, humbling and sometimes tense few weeks here in the studio but the vibes are on point and the atmosphere is everything we needed to put out the best music. We have a few more weeks left at Panda, but we'll need your support getting to the finish line and releasing the album without a label. Our remaining costs will include studio time (mixing, mastering) & physical distribution.

We're going to offer quite a few perks to those who contribute to our campaign, including all the Pre Production Demos as well as our previous works and digital lyric zines. We'll also be printing limited edition merch and producing an episodic video series while we are here at the studio.

story:
Hello! My name is Shasta Hunt.

I’m a Singer/Song writer from West Plains, MO. This project is the culmination of countless hours spent finding inspiration, creating original songs and researching the best way to put everything collectively together.  I am, for the first time in my life, feeling brave enough to offer my music up to my city and my community as part of that bigger picture. 

Those closest to me are aware of how I have always been involved with music and how much I love to sing.  My greatest hearts desire is to express myself intimately and honestly through my voice. It's a powerful tool and I plan to use it to bless others. Recently and through the years , I’ve created many original songs that I've finally come realized are worth sharing, thanks to the unyielding support and amazing encouragement of my family, friends, and producer, Randy Bowen. 

 I have truly been waited my whole life for this.  I've worked SO HARD and come so far! Now, with  YOUR generosity, this Indiegogo campaign is the final step I need to take, and your support WILL help in making this album real.


I grew up singing in Church. I have always had this deep deep passion for singing.  I can remember as a five year old creating songs and sharing them so proudly to my mother and other loved ones. Although a little shy, all that fear went away as soon as I began to sing. It brought me peace and freedom and I soon learned I brought this to others too. My music roots center around a variety of artist and genres.  Some of my favorites were; Sandi Patti, Steven Curtis Chapman, Carmen, Kirk Franklin and DC Talk to name only a few.

         My renewed hope with this EP is to create the songs that God will use to touch peoples hearts and open the doors needed to make this my profession.  I love hearing stories from fans after events about how a song I sang spoke to them and strengthened them through a hard time. This is what really lead me to take my music further; This and the fact that a song always lays on my lips & is continuously playing in my soul. I am never not singing a tune or humming a melody.

Everything has now led up to this moment right now, a walk into my solo career and I'm eager to record my first full length album.

 

This campaign is raising funds for my first professionally recorded album here in Missouri with Randy Bowen, a producer and engineer with 30+ years of experience.  Together, Randy and I are writing original material, unique musical arrangements, and nurturing creative ideas to bring my songs to life in a way that wouldn’t be possible without your help!

            The Idea of Crowdfunding provides a platform for ME to include YOU!!!!

I have friends, family & fans all over this big amazing world we live in, & with Crowdfunding I can connect with everyone & anyone that has been touched by my music, allowing me to invite them to be a part of the music making process, no matter how far the distance between us.

  

To create an EP  of this quality and involvement, studio time and producing costs add up quickly.  With that said, this campaign gives us a necessary and unique opportunity to collaborate to make great, professionally handled art together.  Your donation will cover the following costs of my project:

1. Pre-Production: This is where everything starts.  Randy and I sit down, taking original song ideas and starting to craft the arrangements for each of these songs that will eventually go on the album.  Here, we take the time to create a rough sketch of each song, mapping out structure, which helps me, Randy, and I envision our goals for each song before we start recording.  This ensures maximum use of studio time and a better understanding of the goals of each piece before recording.

2. Recording: This is when I enter the studio and start capturing the music and where the songs become what you'll hear on this album.  Here, we can also add instruments I don’t currently play myself but that will take my arrangements to the next level, like drums, bass, electric guitar and any other instrument that will add the perfect texture and balance to these songs.

3. Mixing & Mastering: Each track will get mixed to create the right balance between instruments, texture and color that make up a track.  As a final step, the album will be tediously mastered from beginning to end, so the listening experience is cohesive and carefully choreographed from start to finish.  Like editing a book, it is making sure every phrase and note is placed perfectly. 

Randy Bowen & I will continue to collaborate in the composition of lyrics to song, music mixing and vocal tracking as we have with our 1st masterpiece "Magnify".  We are super excited to be working together.  We have a strong dynamic that really fosters creative energy and parallel spiritual backings.  We will be doing some live to tape recording and other editing.  The mastering of the album will be done at the exceptional hand of Randy.

Every show of support is meaningful to me.  Here’s the chance to get something in return for your support!!

I am so appreciative and grateful for any help people can lend to this campaign.  I've put together an exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign, so that everyone can benefit from this project!

There is a full list to the right!  If any of these interest you, make sure to click on the gift link to donate and receive! 

 

 

It's hard to express how much this project has the potential to change my life and the way others view what I do. 

Music has this incredible ability to heal and unite people, to express feelings that help us feel connected in fundamental human ways.  For a long time, I was under the impression that I wasn’t doing enough with my music. I wasn't pursing it as a career because I didn't have the guidance or understanding of how to take those first steps. Thanks to Randy and this opportunity, I have come across a new understanding, a steadfast faith in myself and my music and I know things will only go forward from here.  

Having the ability to make this album is something that will open many doors to where I will be able provide the written expression of my feelings that we all so commonly share.

 

If you’d like to contribute, just click the pink "Contribute Now" button on the top right of this page.  Be sure to add a PERK to your contribution and get one of the awesome gifts available!

If you have friends in your network that you think might be interested in supporting this as well, please help get the word out and pass it on!  There are social media share buttons on this page and we all know a little can go a long way.  Part of the point of the project is simply having the confidence to share my music and this is certainly a way to do it. Remember, Sharing is Caring!

Thank you so much if you have read all this and for taking the time to consider everything this campaign is truly about.

With Sincerest Love,

 

 THINGS TO NOTE!!!

If you would like to bring Shasta in to play a concert at your church, event, or at your home, booking inquiries will be taken at: shastaworships@gmail.com

We are currently booking events with the intent of collecting donations for this campaign. We are also booking shows for a Shasta tour that will take place immediately after the album releases.

Randy Bowen & I will continue to collaborate in the composition of lyrics to song, music mixing and vocal tracking as we have with our 1st masterpiece "Magnify".  We are super excited to be working together.  We have a strong dynamic that really fosters creative energy and parallel spiritual backings.  We will be doing some live to tape recording and other editing.  The mastering of the album will be done at the exceptional hand of Randy.


Every show of support is meaningful to me.  Here’s the chance to get something in return for your support!!
I am so appreciative and grateful for any help people can lend to this campaign.  I've put together an exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign, so that everyone can benefit from this project!
There is a full list to the right!  If any of these interest you, make sure to click on the gift link to donate and receive! 

 
 
It's hard to express how much this project has the potential to change my life and the way others view what I do. 
Music has this incredible ability to heal and unite people, to express feelings that help us feel connected in fundamental human ways.  For a long time, I was under the impression that I wasn’t doing enough with my music. I wasn't pursing it as a career because I didn't have the guidance or understanding of how to take those first steps. Thanks to Randy and this opportunity, I have come across a new understanding, a steadfast faith in myself and my music and I know things will only go forward from here.  
Having the ability to make this album is something that will open many doors to where I will be able provide the written expression of my feelings that we all so commonly share.
 

If you’d like to contribute, just click the pink "Contribute Now" button on the top right of this page.  Be sure to add a PERK to your contribution and get one of the awesome gifts available!
If you have friends in your network that you think might be interested in supporting this as well, please help get the word out and pass it on!  There are social media share buttons on this page and we all know a little can go a long way.  Part of the point of the project is simply having the confidence to share my music and this is certainly a way to do it. Remember, Sharing is Caring!
Thank you so much if you have read all this and for taking the time to consider everything this campaign is truly about.
With Sincerest Love,

 

 THINGS TO NOTE!!!

If you would like to bring Shasta in to play a concert at your church, event, or at your home, booking inquiries will be taken at: shastaworships@gmail.com
We are currently booking events with the intent of collecting donations for this campaign. We are also booking shows for a Shasta tour that will take place immediately after the album releases.

story:
INMENSA TOUR 2017

Es un proyecto de Fraaek y Filoxera, dos  bandas guatemaltecas, cuyo objetivo es unir fuerzas e impulsar la interacción artística en Centroamérica.

En esta nueva etapa buscamos forjar alianzas que nos permitan realizar nuestras metas y sean partícipes de nuestros logros.

Contamos con el aporte de gente valiosa en la industria, con experiencia en logística y montaje de eventos de este tipo. Nuestro más reciente proyecto, Gira Triciclo 2016, concluyó exitosamente con un total de 9 presentaciones en Guatemala y El Salvador.

Nuestra meta como artistas y productores es crear los caminos necesarios y nutrirnos de todo el conocimiento posible para crear una industrial musical en Guatemala. 

CALENDARIO DE SHOWS

12 de Mayo - San Salvador, El Salvador

13 de Mayo - Playa El Tunco, El Salvador

20 de Mayo - Antigua Guatemala, Guatemala

27 de Mayo - Quetzaltenango, Guatemala

2 de Junio - Ciudad de Guatemala, Guatemala

24 de Junio - San José, Costa Rica

29 de Junio - Ciudad de Guatemala, Guatemala

 

Lo Que Necesitamos & Lo Que Recibes

Queremos tu ayuda para hacer una gira de conciertos en Ciudad de Guatemala; Antigua Guatemala, Sacatepequez; Xelajú, Quetzaltenango; San Salvador, El Salvador, Playa El Tunco, El Salvador, San José, Costa Rica y Tegucigalpa, Honduras.

Lo recaudado en esta campaña será utilizado para cubrir los gastos de los eventos: (detallar cantidades)

  • PA 
  • Backline
  • Alimentación
  • Hospedaje

Con tu aporte, te puedes llevar alguno de estos paquetes: 

Combo Visual

Un combo para que podas compartir y lucir imagen de Inmensa! Este combo incluye un poster edición limitada firmado por los integrantes de ambas bandas, pines, stickers y dos entradas para cualquier show de la Gira.

 

Inmensa T-Shirt

Adquirí nuestra hermosa T-shirt antes que todos y tenla lista para los shows!

 

Combo Inmenso

Combo que te incluye t-shirts, música de ambas bandas, stickers y dos entradas a cualquier show de la gira!

 

Combo No.2

Un combo que te permite llevar nuestra música adonde quieras! Te incluye discos de ambas bandas, pines oficiales y dos entradas a cualquier show de la Gira.

 

Backstage Passes

Pases dobles para vos y un acompañante a tras bastidores de uno de nuestros eventos. Compartí con las bandas y viví la experiencia junto a nosotros.

 

Masterclass 

Recibí una clase de 2 horas sobre cualquiera de nuestras especialidades para un máximo de 3 personas.

 

Show Privado

Fraaek y Filoxera tocarán un show acústico para vos y 15 amigos. Vos decidís dónde y nosotros llevamos la música (Sólo ciudad de Guatemala).

 

Otras Formas de Apoyar

Tu aporte puede llegar más allá de lo económico. Si quieres contribuir a nuestra campaña pero no puedes hacerlo a través de esta plataforma, podes seguirnos en redes sociales, llegar a los eventos e incluso compartir esta campaña para que llegue a más personas. 

¡Solo haces faltas tú para que esto suceda!

story:
About this Project

My name is Chase Baird and I'm a jazz saxophonist and composer.  For quite a while now, my dream has been to make music that, from the moment you hear it, leaves you changed--It impacts and changes you on a very deep level.  It's what my heroes did and what I hope to do with this album.

One of the special things about this project is the chance to bring my music to life with some of these heroes.  It's really an opportunity of a lifetime.  Brad, Nir, Dan and Antonio have been sources of musical inspiration to me for many years (in some cases almost since I first began playing!).  I’m beyond thrilled to get to collaborate with them on my music.

 

Breakdown of Costs

The budget of $14,500 will be used for everything from rehearsal costs to manufacturing CD’s, and promotion.

Here some of the many necessary expenses:

  • Music studio rental for one day of recording
  • Rehearsal space rental
  • Engineering fees
  • Compensation for band members
  • Mixing and mastering expenses (post-production)
  • Album artwork and graphic design
  • Disc manufacturing 
  • Distribution fees 
  • Marketing

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this project page on social media!

story:
Who we are

We're Callow - a male/female duo, based in the San Francisco Bay area. Our music is dark, cathartic, and raw, because it comes from a deeply emotional place. (We call it "dream/doom" - thanks to a musical friend and fan in Coeur d'Alene who described us that way a few years ago. We love our fans! You guys rule.)

We've been writing music and touring since 2009. In the beginning we were really fueled by the economic crash, and what happened to us in its wake.

We took a break from touring for the last couple of years, in order to get our lives back together, and during that time we've been writing the music that has become our third album, Mothdust. (Why "Mothdust"? For one thing, our practice space is a moth-haven. Moths are very curious night creatures - much less appreciated than their colorful daytime counterpart, butterflies, and yet so beautiful in their own way. We had long been enamored with night creatures, and had even talked about writing a concept album based on them. so when they showed up at our practice space, it was as if they'd heard our talking, and came to be our muses.) .

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $5000

  • $3100 is for the vinyl pressing (includes full-color inserts & full color jackets)
  • $1000 is to finish mixing the songs. (they're all recorded and half-way mixed, but we need help to pay for the rest to be mixed.)
  • $900 is for mastering, including a separate master for vinyl.

With your support, you'll get the vinyl LP and digital download, and lots of other good stuff. (posters that we screen-printed ourselves, a personal live set on video stream. we'll even come play at your house!) 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute funds, please help us spread the word!

It means the world to us when we see folks on social media sharing our music. Please consider sharing this with your friends, social media contacts, email lists, etc. Everything helps! 

Come see us at a show! Our next one is Feb 23 in Oakland

Sign up for our email list to stay in the loop about future releases and projects. (you can sign up at our website - www.callowmusic.com, or feel free to message us or reach out on social media.)

story:
Mi ez az egész hajcihő?

A Satöbbi zenekar felkészült, hogy átírja a világ popzenei történelemkönyvének lapjait. Ha valaha volt is egy épkézláb gondolatod arról, hogy mi is az a vérbeli, felejthetetlen és szórakoztató könnyűzene, felejtsd el!


Az együttes nem másra készül, minthogy elkészítse minden idők leghülyébb, legemlékezetesebb, legszuperlatívuszosabb albumát, melynek címe:
Vissza a pénzt!


Ilyenkor joggal merül fel a kérdés minden gondolkodó lényben, hogy milyen pénzt?
A válasz egyszerű. Azt a pénzt, amit épp most kunyerál a zenekar, hogy ki tudja adni az albumát, a Vissza a pénzt (vagy Vissza a pénztet). Tudsz követni?


És Te most nemcsak kortárs kívülállója lehetsz e nagyszerű folyamatnak, hanem abban a szerencsés helyzetben vagy, hogy aktívan, pénzadással is részt vehetsz benne. 


Legyél az impresszáriónk! A mecénásunk! A mentorunk! És mi nem kevesebbel háláljuk meg Neked, minthogy valóban tevőleges részese lehetsz ezeknek a történelmi eseményeknek.

Hogyan? Lássuk a részleteket!

Miért is jó ez az egész Neked?

Azon kívül, hogy a zenetörténelem része leszel:

  • 5 Euróért (kb. 1500 Ft)  megkapod a lemezanyagot online letölthető formában,
  • 10 Euróért (kb. 3000 Ft) megkapod a lemezanyagot CD-n,
  • 15 Euróért (kb. 4500 Ft) megkapod a lemezanyagot dedikált CD-n,
  • 20 Euróért (kb. 6000 Ft) megkapod a lemezanyagot dedikált CD-n, és mellé egy Satöbbi koncertbelépőt, 
  • 25 Euróért (kb. 7500 Ft) megkapod a lemezanyagot CD-n, amin név szerint feltüntetünk Téged, mint a Satöbbi zenekar támogatóját,
  • 100 és még több Euróért (kb. marha sok Ft) megkapod mindezt együtt és még egy élethosszig tartó, térítésmentes gravitációt.

Sajnálod tőlünk a pénzt, de segítenél?

Egye fene! Azt is megköszönjük! Csak oszd meg a linket, terjeszd itt-ott-amott! Posztolj, kommentelj, tagelj, csekkolj, dokkolj, blokkolj, mindegy, csak mindenki tudjon róla.

Nem sajnálod tőlünk a pénzt?

Jól teszed! Minden egyes forint örök kővé válik a Satöbbi zenekar halhatatlan legendává válásának kacskaringós útján.

Kérsz valamit a pénzedért?

Nem vagy egy önzetlen típus, de érthető...

1. Válaszd ki a jobb oldalon található "Perks" oszlopból a neked tetsző ajándékot és támogatói összeget.
2. Kattints a doboz alján megjelenő "Get this perk" gombra.
3. Innen a program végigvezet az átutaláson.

Nem kérsz semmit a pénzedért?

Ilyen is van? Te tudod...

1. Kattints a jobb oldal tetején lévő "Back it" gombra.
2. Írd be a támogatói összeget, majd kattints a "Check out" gombra.
3. Innen a program végigvezet az átutaláson.

Millió hála, és mostantól jogosan lehet követelni Vissza a pénzt!

story:
Hi,

My name is Derek Hines and I've been singing as long as I can remember.

Like many I got my start singing in church. I've done everything musically imaginable. From competing at the Kiwanis Music Festival as a child to performing in musicals in High school. I even fronted a funk band.

It wasn't until I started singing jazz that I truly felt at home. It's been nearly 20 years now. I have had the great honour to perform with some of the idioms greatest heroes. I have traveled and performed in front of 1000's of people with my quintet and quartet.

I don't say any of this because I think I better then anyone else; rather I do so to illustrate the joy you can bring to yourself and others when you step out on the ice and share your gifts.

This record brings to fruition a promise I made to my mother before she passed away. The songs on the upcoming recording are favourites of hers. I hear her voice when I sing them. I decided to make them my own by singing them my way.

With you generous support I can share my new project with you and the world.

So here is the meat and potatoes of the campaign. I’ve partnered with Grammy nominated arranger Ezra Weiss. He's contracted 17 of the finest musicians he knows to back me up. As you well might imagine production costs will be high(arranging,recording and engineering) . Add in the post-production costs of mastering, pressing and publicity and the project will easily top $15,000.

I’ve opted for the flex funding model, meaning that the recording will happen with or without all the funds it will just be a bit more of a challenge to complete.

I understand there will be those who wish to contribute who might not necessarily have the financial resources to do so. You can still pitch in by sharing this campaign with others via social media.

Thanks in advance for the support and for taking the time to check out my campaign.

Derek

story:
Insane! We are almost done with our 2nd album and it is very exciting and feels so good to have something that we can be proud of, better yet – share it!

We are Music InWallved, a band from Vilnius, Lithuania. We play instrumental music, which falls into the category of post-rock genre that is usually defined by atmospheric soundscapes, swells, lots of reverb and delay; and yes, you will find all of it in our new album “Metamorphosis”. But more importantly – you will find stories. Not literally (it’s an instrumental music, after all) but stories that we tell with our music. Stories of loneliness and friendships, loss and discovery, angst and comfort – it’s all there, waiting for you to find it!

 

It takes two to have a conversation, so we hope you will hear us by expressing your support for this campaign. Our goal is 3500 USD, which will help to cover the studio costs.


They are:

  • recording

  • mixing and

  • mastering of the album

 

We already have a single track from this album. It is called Dinosaur. Enjoy the track below!

 

Every raised euro will go towards the album. Even if we don’t reach our goal we are still making this happen! (does anyone know bank`s interest rates on album production loans?..) Anyway, we hope you will enjoy our music and spare your 10 EUR (don’t hold yourself back).

Don’t forget the good stuff! We have prepared some neat perks for you. Make sure to check them out!

 

We often get asked where people can buy our album (second most popular question after “Why no one sings?”) and for the most time we have nothing to say because  what we have is just bits and bobs thrown across the internet (except for the 1st album, which was 100% DYI) but now we want to change things. We want to have a good quality album available for anyone interested in our music; and we promise you, we’ll keep you interested!

 

 

We will be truly grateful for any way in which you can help us with this campaign. Sharing, caring, backing it up – it all means a lot to us.

 

 

 

We have prepared 8 awesome perks for You. 

Choose your own:

$6       Signed photo of us sent to you by mail

$11      Digital album copy download

$19     Signed physical album

$22     T-shirt with our artwork

$33     T-shirt + physical Album

$250  Visit band's live rehearsal + physical Album + T-Shirt

$500 Become a co-producer + physical Album + T-Shirt

$550 Post-rocker's starter pack + physical Album + T-Shirt

 

More details below:


For $6: get a personal message on our band's photo. Support our band's activity!

 

 

For $11: this perk gives you to download a digital copy of the full album  2 months before it's official release date.

 

 

For $19: get a physical album with a special cover including SD/MicroSD card inside.
We will send it wherever you want it. 

Here are photos of a real closed/opened cover of upcoming album... Isn't it awesome? We have put our hearts into it!

 

 

For $22: white T-shirt with a special artwork designed by our keyboard player Edgar. 
Includes a digital download of the album.

Choose A or B type of T-shirt:

 

 

 

For $33: Here is our favorite perk!

This perk is best if you want to get a physical copy of album together with a special T-shirt.

 

 

For $250: get a personal live show for you and your friends (up to 4) in our rehearsal studio. Drinks, snacks and lots of fun included!

 

For $500: Have your name listed as the one and the only Co-Producer of our album - which you will be! Your name will be placed exactly on the cover of our album:

 

 

For $550: You want start playing post-rock on a guitar? Then we have all that you need for the first steps. 
Electric guitar, effects processor and guitar amp. Actually theese are our personal instruments that helped us to start this journey years ago..

 

 

 

 

 

Q. How and when do I get the downloadable album?

A. With the purchase of downloadable package, you will receive an email with download link as soon as the campaign ends. The end of campaign is 30th of June.

To ensure you receive the emails, mark that you are ok with receiving campaign updates when checking out!

Q. How and when do I get the physical copy of album?

A. As soon as the campaign ends (30th of June) we start producing album. We plan to send everything to you during end of July - mid of August period.

Q. I haven’t gotten an email with downloadable songs yet, what’s going on?

A. If it’s been more than 2 days after ending of campaign, please email musicinwallved@gmail.com with your concerns, and we will make sure you get the downloads.

Q. Will my card be charged today or at the end of the campaign?

A. You will be charged upon purchase.

 

 

 

Please support us!
story_txt:
Insane! We are almost done with our 2nd album and it is very exciting and feels so good to have something that we can be proud of, better yet – share it!We are Music InWallved, a band from Vilnius, Lithuania. We play instrumental music, which falls into the category of post-rock genre that is usually defined by atmospheric soundscapes, swells, lots of reverb and delay; and yes, you will find all of it in our new album “Metamorphosis”. But more importantly – you will find stories. Not literally (it’s an instrumental music, after all) but stories that we tell with our music. Stories of loneliness and friendships, loss and discovery, angst and comfort – it’s all there, waiting for you to find it! It takes two to have a conversation, so we hope you will hear us by expressing your support for this campaign. Our goal is 3500 USD, which will help to cover the studio costs.They are:
recording
mixing and

story:
About this project

Our album entitled «Dark and Light», will consist of 12 tracks recorded on two discs (6 tracks per disc). These discs will show the two sides of our music - dark and light. The works of Bruno Mars, Coldplay and Michael Jachson were inspiration for our "light" disk compositions. The other half of the album - "dark" - will have more aggressive and deeper sound. These compositions were written under the influence of the Apocalyptica, Rammstein and Metallica.

We want to make our debut album as inclusive as possible to attract the largest audience possible and satisfy the most sophisticated tastes.

SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT

We need $5200 to release our album and spend this money on:

  • Track recording - $100x12 tracks
  • Mixing and mastering - $150x12 tracks
  • Cover design &  publishing  (100 pcs.) - $1000
  • PR - $1000
  • Indiegogo fees - $200

We plan to finish production of our album in November 2017 and release a digital copy to you. Physical copy will be able next year 'cause it needs more time.

WHAT YOU WILL GET

Along with the standard things that you receive if you donate money to our album (postcard, mp3 or CD, T-shirt, our thanks for sponsorship in social networks and on the site, etc.), you can also get the following exclusive items:

  • With our help you can congratulate someone on his/her birthday, name day, Thanksgiving day or weddings. You will receive a congratulatory video with your favorite song in our interpretation. You will also receive a link to the full version of this song as a bonus track of the album.
  • If you also musician and just start the music path – we'll give you the opportunity to enhance your skill in the performance of our compositions. We will send you an e-book with scores of all our tracks in the arrangement for a piano (easy piano) and solo instrument.  If you are an experienced professional musician and want to play our music, you can get a signed physical copy of all the original scores of this album, including original scores and batches.
  • And the main "prize" of our campaign is the invitation to take part in the filming of our music video, which we’ll be filming on one of the compositions of the «light» part of the album. No, you don't have to come to cast. It’s enough to send your photo, which will be closely intertwined with the video’s plot.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us record our first debut album not only by purchasing a disc and another staff, but also sharing this page. Tell your friends about us and this project in social networks, via phone and in person, be it at the lunch or at the date. Also, follow the recording process on our Facebook and Instagram page and web-site www.rockoko.com.ua

We really need your help!

And thanks for attention!

Best regards,  your ROCKOKO

story:
About J.Stiles / Folded Arms

For over 25 years I've been writing, recording and performing music. I've been lucky enough to play and tour the country with a band called The Cinderleaf, backed by managers, agents and lawyers (big time, right?) . Additionally, I've been fortunate to write with and perform alongside some talented musicians in The Cemetery Hips, MidAir Collision, The Cobra Cobra Come on Overs as well as recording 3 full length solo albums. 

With my 9th album, I decided to take a different approach to making a record. Rather than working with a full band for years to write and refine songs, I challenged myself to track and demo 16 tunes in one short week. 

One week later, I met up with the legendary Joe Reyes (of Buttercup fame) at El Jeff Studios and proceeded to build each song with no preconceived notions, tune by tune in the studio. A small handful of talented friends stopped by and helped contribute. After two weeks the "Folded Arms" project was complete and is hands down my favorite. 

*Fun Fact: Folded Arms is the name of a swanky (and silly) restaurant in the 1966 film, Batman the movie. God Bless Adam West. 

What's This Campaign All About?

I love records...I've listened to and collected them my entire life. Nothing beats the touch, sound, even the smell of vinyl. Nothing compares to holding the full size artwork in your hand, combing over the lyrics while you commit the time to sit and listen to an artist change your world. 

For 25 years I've made music and for even longer I've wanted a real record to call my own. With your help, now is the time! Mixing, mastering and artwork are complete and ready to send to press. You can help make this a reality by pre-purchasing the Folded Arms LP. 

You'll get a limited pressing of the album on colored vinyl + all kinds of cool perks. Maybe I'm biased, but I'd totally buy one.

What's Needed & How It's Used

This campaign is primarily a pre-order for my album. The perks are all for a bit of extra fun! The minimum needed to fulfill the orders is $4,500. I have listed the breakdown below. 

Record pressing - $3,000

Shirt printing - $800

Stickers - $100

Indiegogo + CC fees, taxes, packaging - $600

Why It Matters

With a confirmed number of pre-orders, not only do I know the exact number of records to order, I will also know what funds are left remaining to order extra stock to sell at the merch booth and through the online store.

Why I Need Your Help...

The upfront cost of pressing full 12" vinyl records is quite costly (7-10x more than a CD) and after recording, mixing, mastering, and album art; it's difficult to find the funds to pull it off without assistance. For as long as I have been recording music, I have dreamed of pressing an album onto vinyl and have never had the means to do so until now.  

I intend to make the very best use of all funds received with much gratitude!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate but enjoy what you hear and see, please share my story with your friends! It's always thrilling to reach new people and cannot wait to see where this project and your generosity will take us. Thank you so much!

story:
Jennifer Ann's New Album: URBAN SHAMANISM.

Is grown one seed at a time.

~PLANT SEEDS & GROW MUSIC~

For every dollar received for the funding of this album, a seed will be planted.

So let's plant seeds and grow music.

To consciously plant seeds is a way to (re)connect with the earth and contribute to the cycle of birth, life, death and rebirth. Many people have lost their natural way with life and by the simple act of consciously planting seeds back into the earth, we can restore the balance that we have often lost over the course of a lifetime.

Through my music I would like to inspire people to re-think their life and first restore their personal balance with nature and second to research how they can contribute to creating a beautiful world to leave behind for the next generations.

****************************

HOW TO DONATE WITHOUT CREDITCARD!

Choose your perk!

And transfer money to this Paypal account:

jenniferannsings@gmail.com

*Don't forget to add the perk! So I know what to send you! & postage costs! If you want a physical CD ( $5 Europe & $10 world coverage)

************************

***A CALL TO ACTION***

PLANT SEEDS AND GROW MUSIC

My name is Jennifer Ann and I have been inspired by the ancient traditions for many years now. I had lost my way and connection to natural life many years ago and slowly found my way back to the old traditions and the simplicity of nature.

Through ancient cultures, I was able to relearn the ways of our ancestors on how to stay connected to my soul-mission ( Which we all have!) and receive the light of source energy that floods our beings every moment here on earth, we just simply have to remember to surrender.

Once we understand we are always connected to source energy, this can become a daily practice and guide.

My music is based and inspired by these ancient ways and this is the message I would like to spread.

The album will contain a mixture of mantra, ancient chants and original songs. I have been writing a lot of original songs in the past years, that I would love to record properly. For example this song:

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferannsings/pachamama-sing-to-me

My journey has taken me from the deep roots of the Amazon jungle,

to the high mountains of the Himalaya's. 

And now it's my time to give back all that I have learned.

Over the years, I have studied yoga, learned about plants, natural building, natural medicines, meditation, breathing , traveling, ancient ways, indigenous cultures, community, art and so much more. I have been sharing this in classes, workshops, retreats, ceremonies and music around the globe and still growing.

Now is my time to:

GO BIG,

THINK BIG,

FEEL BIG,

GIVE BACK BIG,

RECEIVE BIG,

SHARE BIG....

Because there is no time to wait, waist or hesitate. I am ready to give back to the people and back to the earth. This is the way, THE TIME IS NOW. We are here to inspire, educate and share the love.

Here's a video of a workshop I was teaching with Ayla Schafer. We are playing the ho'oponopono song, one of the songs that wants to be recorded.

 

****************************************************************************

Budget:

There are many different ways to break the budget down, for now these will be the main pillars to focus on.

Studio (recording, mixing, mastering, producer): $5000

Musicians ( Travels, expenses etc.): $2000

Music Video + Photo Shoot: $2000

Pressing album & Artwork: $1500

PR & Marketing: $ 1500

Travel expenses for recording abroad: $2000

Indiegogo costs: $1120

Total: $15120

*******

HOW TO DONATE WITHOUT CREDITCARD!

Choose your perk!

And transfer money to this Paypal account:

jenniferannsings@gmail.com

*Don't forget to add the perk! So I know what to send you! & postage costs! If you want a physical CD ( $5 Europe & $10 world coverage)

***************************************************************************

WHY?

I don't just want to make music, I want to contribute to a better place for the next generations, for our children and children's children.

To do so, I am using a very simple, yet ancient knowledge of planting seeds. We really underestimate the power of planting seeds. The more we plant, the more opportunities there are for 'wild' plants, flowers and trees to sprout and find a way to contribute to a greener atmosphere within the cities and beyond.

And of course you can imagine...

This does't only effect the plant that will grow, it stretches way, way beyond and effects the whole ecosystem, including the bees, the insects, the air, the waters and so on...

-I will collect seeds and give them good places to grow.

-I will 'guerrilla' plant seeds ( including produce and flowers) in the cities!

-I will plant with care & the intention to make the world a better and greener place to live in for next generations to come..

- And of course I will record inspirational music that will continue to grow and flow around the globe ;-)

 

*****************************************************************

Below an inspirational video on how things can unfold....

Check out this video on how 1 man, planted 11.000 trees to reforest 250 acres of land!
This is a big inspiration and demonstration on how we can make a difference by planting seeds. Let's plant together! And make that change!

​

 

************************************************************

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can donate a low a $5!

But if you really can't spend those $5, don't worry! You can contribute by spreading the word with your friends, family and social media channels. Your contribution and share is very much appreciated! Together we can make this mission work.

So...If ya feel inspired...

 SPREAD THE WORD!

SHARE!

SPREAD!

FLY!

GROW!

POLLINATE! ;-)

***

I love you so much

Thank you for taking the time to read about my campaign!

We are on this journey together

And I am honored to get to know you

travel with you

embark on this magical mission as an earthly global tribe

************************************************************

HOW TO DONATE WITHOUT CREDITCARD!

Choose your perk!

And transfer money to this Paypal account:

jenniferannsings@gmail.com

*Don't forget to add the perk & postage costs! ( $5 Europe & $10 world coverage)

***************************************************************************

Some songs that will be recorded:

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferannsings/hooponopono-fb-live-version

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferannsings/pachamama-sing-to-me

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferannsings/prayer-song

***********************************************************************

Social Media:

www.facebook.com/jenniferannsings

www.jenniferannsings.com

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferannsings

https://jenniferann.bandcamp.com

https://www.youtube.com/jenniferannsings

 

 

 

 

HOW TO DONATE WITHOUT CREDITCARD!

Choose your perk!

And transfer money to this Paypal account:

jenniferannsings@gmail.com

*Don't forget to add the perk! So I know what to send you! & postage costs! If you want a physical CD ( $5 Europe & $10 world coverage)
